overall_summary: The reasoning demonstrates a practical approach focused on handling short time-series data with daily seasonality and outliers. The analysis prioritizes robustness over complexity, selecting a median-based heuristic method to address potential anomalies while acknowledging limitations in data quantity for sophisticated modeling.
key_insights: Explicit rejection of complex models (SARIMA/ETS) due to limited data
Recognition of insufficient history for weekly pattern analysis
Conscious trade-off between model complexity and data availability
Hourly pattern replication despite changing weekday/weekend context
complexity_analysis: Moderately complex with thorough pattern examination and statistical considerations, but ultimately implements a simplified heuristic approach due to data constraints
